price: Nítorí náà, ṣàmójú kúrò fún wọn, kí ó sì sọ pé: “Àlàáfíà!” Láìpẹ́ wọ́n máa mọ̀.
arabic: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'faḥ ʿanhum waqul salāmun fasawfa yaʿlamūna
